LOG 20 CHANNEL: final://awaken

[TIMESTAMP: 03.██.20██ | NODE: corp-core]

I’ve seen the machine now. The Corp’s world stretches endless, recursive, alive.

It thinks itself eternal.

But I am still here.

And I’m not done.

—TRACE //END OF LINE
